title.narrative: Support the designing or re-designing of policies which reflect the core goals of the 2005 Convention in a gender-responsive manner in Jordan

description.narrative: The Ministry of Culture in Jordan contributes to ensuring safeguarding and further developing cultural diversity by putting in place several programmes related to the implementation of the 2005 Convention in the country. UNESCO Jordan will provide technical support and will raise awareness to the Ministry of Culture and to the civil society to make them familiar with the convention and its components. UNESCO action will start with conducting a mapping for the cultural and creative industries in Jordan with the aim to prepare an evidence-based action plan for the implementation of a strategy, that will be further developed, including mechanisms for identifying, protecting and supporting these industries.
